004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010
011/** ArmFeedforward JNI. */
012public final class ArmFeedforwardJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static {
016    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
017      try {
018        RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
019      } catch (Exception ex) {
020        ex.printStackTrace();
021        System.exit(1);
022      }
023      libraryLoaded = true;
024    }
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Force load the library.
029   *
030   * @throws IOException If the library could not be loaded or found.
031   */
032  public static synchronized void forceLoad() throws IOException {
033    if (libraryLoaded) {
034      return;
035    }
036    RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
037    libraryLoaded = true;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Obtain a feedforward voltage from a single jointed arm feedforward object.
042   *
043   * <p>Constructs an ArmFeedforward object and runs its currentVelocity and nextVelocity overload
044   *
045   * @param ks The ArmFeedforward's static gain in volts.
046   * @param kv The ArmFeedforward's velocity gain in volt seconds per radian.
047   * @param ka The ArmFeedforward's acceleration gain in volt secondsÂ² per radian.
048   * @param kg The ArmFeedforward's gravity gain in volts.
049   * @param currentAngle The current angle in the calculation in radians.
050   * @param currentVelocity The current velocity in the calculation in radians per second.
051   * @param nextVelocity The next velocity in the calculation in radians per second.
052   * @param dt The time between velocity setpoints in seconds.
053   * @return The calculated feedforward in volts.
054   */
055  public static native double calculate(
056      double ks,
057      double kv,
058      double ka,
059      double kg,
060      double currentAngle,
061      double currentVelocity,
062      double nextVelocity,
063      double dt);
064
065  /** Sets whether JNI should be loaded in the static block. */
066  public static class Helper {
067    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
068
069    /**
070     * Returns true if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
071     *
072     * @return True if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
073     */
074    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
075      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Sets whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
080     *
081     * @param load Whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
082     */
083    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
084      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
085    }
086
087    /** Utility class. */
088    private Helper() {}
089  }
090
091  /** Utility class. */
092  private ArmFeedforwardJNI() {}
093}
